titleStmt.title: The third step of a nonconformist, for the recovery of the use of his ministry with some occasional notice taken of the judgment and decree of the University of Oxford, past in their convocation, July 21, 1683 / by one of the followers of peace, and lovers of impartiality.
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
